arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} additional damage to surrounding enemies.
